sent.orig: Thank you, thank you, thank you for your donations and keep up the good work!
sent.trans: 谢谢！谢谢你们的捐赠！希望大家能够继续努力！

sent.orig: Thank you very much. Thank you. Thank you very much.
Thank you. Thank you, my friends. Thank you for coming here on this beautiful Arizona evening.
sent.trans: 感谢各位！我们的朋友们，感谢你们！感谢你们在亚利桑那这个美好的夜晚来到这里！

sent.orig: Thank you. Thank you all so much.
Well, thank you, Robbie. Thank you.
